attributes.action: consider legislation to protect our servicemen and women from verbal or physical abuse for wearing the queens uniform.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our democracy, servicemen and women act on behalf of the British people as directed by parliament. We all recognise that there are differences of opinion about the ongoing conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan. These differences indicate a healthy democracy, but the place for this debate is in Parliament and the media, not to abuse our soldiers, sailors and airmen/women in the street. We should all respect the dedication, professionalism and patriotism of our troops, who are after all, our brothers, sisters, fathers and mothers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
